member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.MultiKeyBoardModule
member.summary: Class for initializing the module for displaying the multi-character keyboards and handling their input.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.MultiKeyBoardModule.#ctor(Prism.Regions.IRegionManager,Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The prism region manager (obtained through DI).
The unity DI container (obtained through DI).

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.MultiKeyBoardModule.Initialize
member.summary: Registers a unique instance of the multi-key text model and of each of the keyboard view-models in the dependency injection container and registers their views with the region manager to the corresponding region of the window.

member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.Model.MultikeyTextModel
member.summary: This class contains the model of currently held multi-character text. It is used by the suggestion service module to disambiguate between the different possible words which can be formed by using the previously selected characters and to suggest auto-completion candidates. The current version of the application holds an alternative model directly in the suggestion service; both approaches have benefits and thus non-operational class is included.

member.name: P:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.Model.MultikeyTextModel.CurrentMultiCharacterText
member.summary: Gets or sets the current multi-character text.

member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.ViewModels.QwertySpanishMultiKeyboardViewModel
member.summary: This class contains the logic related to edition of the multi-character buffer. Note that the view-model currently communicates directly with the suggestion service, this is a design decision for the current version of the application; an alternative would be to modify the model instance and expose an interface for the suggestion service to consume the necessary information.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.ViewModels.QwertySpanishMultiKeyboardViewModel.#ctor(Prism.Events.IEventAggregator,TalkingKeyboard.Infrastructure.ServiceInterfaces.ISuggestionService)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.ViewModels.QwertySpanishMultiKeyboardViewModel.AddMultiCharacterCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets the add multi-character command.

member.name: P:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.ViewModels.QwertySpanishMultiKeyboardViewModel.RemoveLastMultiCharacterCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets the command for removing the last multi-character.

member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.Views.QwertySpanishMultiKeyboard
member.summary: This class describes a Spanish keyboard with multiple-character keys arranged in the QWERTY layout. No logic is handled in this class and can be fully edited in a designer-oriented program.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.MultiKeyBoard.Views.QwertySpanishMultiKeyboard.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
